title: Best of The Program | 2/27/20
description:
Bernie’s radicals are always active. Glenn breaks down the revolutionary track records of Bernie’s top campaign staff and how Democrats must put an end to this before their party and country are transformed. And as the world wakes up to coronavirus, the U.S. gets its first case of unknown origins, reinfection risk may be higher than expected, and … Romney. But while one Chinese city considers banning eating dogs and other strange animals, one meat you won’t find on the list is bat.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
